properties.name: database.host
properties.description: The hostname of the database, defaults to 'localhost:3306'.

properties.name: database.schema
properties.description: The name of the schema containing the database, defaults to 'pogs'.

properties.name: database.url
properties.description: The url for the database, defaults to a jdbc:mysql URL containing the configured host and schema.

properties.name: database.username
properties.description: The username to access the database.

properties.name: database.password
properties.description: The password to access the database.
